argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_distop | |- ( A e. V -> ~P A e. Top ) |
| 2 |  | #P_unipw | |- U. ~P A = A |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eqcomi | |- A = U. ~P A |
| 4 | 3 | #P_iscld | |- ( ~P A e. Top -> ( x e. ( Clsd ` ~P A ) <-> ( x C_ A /\ ( A \ x ) e. ~P A ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. ( Clsd ` ~P A ) <-> ( x C_ A /\ ( A \ x ) e. ~P A ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_difss | |- ( A \ x ) C_ A |
| 7 |  | #P_elpw2g | |- ( A e. V -> ( ( A \ x ) e. ~P A <-> ( A \ x ) C_ A ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( A e. V -> ( A \ x ) e. ~P A ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_biantrud | |- ( A e. V -> ( x C_ A <-> ( x C_ A /\ ( A \ x ) e. ~P A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. ( Clsd ` ~P A ) <-> x C_ A ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_selpw | |- ( x e. ~P A <-> x C_ A ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. ( Clsd ` ~P A ) <-> x e. ~P A ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( A e. V -> ( Clsd ` ~P A ) = ~P A ) |
